meanings.definition: In a careful and prudent manner.
meanings.sent1: She discreetly placed the fragile vase on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: He discreetly checked his watch during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel discreetly hid its acorns in the tree hollow.
meanings.sent4: The detective discreetly followed the suspect through the crowded market.
meanings.sent5: The ninja moved discreetly through the shadows, unseen by his enemies.

meanings.definition: Without drawing attention or causing embarrassment.
meanings.sent1: The waiter discreetly refilled our water glasses without interrupting our conversation.
meanings.sent2: She discreetly slipped the note into his bag without anyone noticing.
meanings.sent3: The cat discreetly knocked over the vase and then pretended to be innocent.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight discreetly illuminated the path through the dark forest.
meanings.sent5: The magician discreetly pulled the rabbit out of the hat, leaving the audience amazed.
